explains: adj. 狂喜的；出神的，入迷的；（反应）热情的，兴奋的

sentences.en: Sally was ecstatic about her new job.
sentences.cn: 萨莉对她的新工作高兴得发狂。

sentences.en: They gave an ecstatic reception to the speech.
sentences.cn: 他们给该演讲以热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: His wife gave birth to their first child, and he was ecstatic about it.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子生下了他们的第一个孩子，他对此欣喜若狂。
